ActFinancial Administration Act
Borrowing Authority Act, 1996-97
PrecisAuthority to specify $206 billion as the aggregate principal amount of money that the Minister may borrow during the 2007-2008 fiscal year through the issue and sale of Government of Canada securities or other instruments, such as Treasury Bills and Notes, effective October 26, 2007.
